Article.ArticleTitle: [Exercise therapy for patients with metabolic syndrome].

AbstractText: The author presents a list of physical activity effects in metabolic and cardiovascular adaptation and current knowledge of the molecular mechanism of the effect of exercise on insulin resistance. The main principles for the prescription of exercise therapy for patients with metabolic syndrome are presented. The role of patient motivation and compliance is emphasised as part of a complex approach to the treatment of metabolic syndrome; it has a substantial influence on the results of treatment.

Article.VernacularTitle: Pohybová lécba u pacientů s metabolickým syndromem.
